name: thatsaweird-lookingdog
description: thatsaweird-lookingdog is a game I made to explore the audiovisual performance aspects of the op-z. I made it with the videolab SDK, but it doesn't actually work in the op-z app. However, if you own an op-z and plug it into your computer, it'll work like a regular PC game and send MIDI messages back and forth. I'm assuming it should also work with other MIDI controllers, though I haven't tested it yet. Pressing play activates the more traditional arcade shooter game mode, while pressing stop switches it to a sandbox mode where you can shoot at different objects to trigger sounds.
